parameters.name: EventKey
parameters.description: The keyword of the alert item.

parameters.name: EventName
parameters.description: The name of the alert item.

parameters.name: EventType
parameters.description:
The alert type.

*   Set the value to **sensitiveFile**.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the alert handling rule.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese.
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.
